review: I have been on rivaroxaban for over 4 years with absolutely no problems. I had two DVDs and a PE, Was put on blood thinners for life and really struggled with warfarin as could never get my INR steady I was constantly visiting for blood tests. Since having Rivaoxyban, everything is stable. I have travelled different long distances with no problems and have no side-effects. So far!

I was started on Xeralto 2 months ago. I am now experiencing spikes in blood pressure, blood sugars, headaches, dizziness, ringing in ear, headache. I feel awful, awful. I am stopping this drug before I feel worse. PLEASE if you have any of these symptoms stop . Call your Doctor. If they won't stop it.  See another doctor that actually cares about you. Please listen before it's too late.

Xarelto (rivaroxaban):2008, I broke my leg from a dirt bike accident, got a DVT under my knee on leg with the cast, then broke into Bi-lateral multiple Pulmonary Embolisms. Put on Coumadin for 6 months. 18 months later, working for 4 1/2 hours at a desk, stood up, had another DVT under the opposite leg, went into  Bi-lateral multiple Pulmonary Embolisms again!   Test showed Factor V Leiden.After 2 years, my Dr put me on Xeralto, living a more normal life.  Last 2 months terrible pain in my right 3 toes, Podiatrist noted that foot was red and warm, compared to left foot. Ordered an Ultrasound on my leg, have a blood clot?! He is having a Vasular Surgeon review and see it he wants to see me. Darn it, now after nearly 10 years this is happening?!!! I am concerned, 1) should my dosage at 20 mg be increased? 2) should I have surgery to dissolve or remove the blood clot? I am sure upset and apprehensive!!!!

Xarelto (rivaroxaban):I was put on Xarelto in Spain after I got a blood clot. When I returned to the US I stayed on it another two months.  It’s ridiculously expensive and has no antidote but I still gave  it a try. My last ultrasound still showed my blood clot was there.  So my vascular surgeon took me off it. My new hemotologist wants me back on it but  I don’t see any benefits to this medication.  I am going to try a natural supplement called platexia. Hopefully it will relieve my pain in my leg and foot and dissolve my blood clots.  (Old and newer) one from pregnancy the other maybe from birth control.

Xarelto (rivaroxaban):I hate the side effects from Xarelto. I've been diagnosed with Leiden factor V blood disorder. Had been on warfarin for 10 years with no side effects however it was discovered blood clots were still forming in my legs. Was placed on Xarelto October 2017. Up until October I was very active in running 3-4miles 5 x week along with swimming 2-3,000 yards 1-2x a week. Now I can barely walk briskly.  Terrible knee joint and leg muscle pain. Can no longer enjoy running or swimming. Doctor suggested putting me on Eliquis....read other patient accounts for that drug and it seems worse than Xarelto. I'm alive but frustrated that pain from from side effects of this drug has severely restricted physical activity
